feed.title: Google Cloud: Workflows
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Workflows

entry.content: Workflows is available in the following additional region: asia-southeast3 (Bangkok, Thailand).
entry.summary: Workflows has expanded its reach and is now available in the asia-southeast3 region, located in Bangkok, Thailand. This new availability allows users in this region to leverage Workflows for their application orchestration needs.
entry.title: Change: Workflows now in Asia Southeast 3
